function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of 5G robots for COVID-19 containment","Impact":"Potential risk of virus transmission through robot interaction","Mitigation":"Implement strict disinfection protocols for the robots","Technologies":"Disinfection technology, UV-C robots","People":"Hospital staff, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, robot manufacturers"},{"Description":"Deployment of 5G robots in high-traffic areas","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread if robots are not properly sanitized","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization and maintenance of robots","Technologies":"UV-C sterilization, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Telecom operators, robot manufacturers"},{"Description":"Wearable IoT devices for patient monitoring","Impact":"Possibility of data privacy breaches and security vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption and user authentication measures","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure authentication protocols","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"IoT device manufacturers, healthcare facilities"}]}
